mapper.sql: roleid, available, roledesc, roleval, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select: SELECT t_user_info.userid, t_user_info.`name`, t_user_info.`pwd`, t_user_info.salt, t_user_info.state, t_user_info.username, t_role_info.roleid, t_role_info.available, t_role_info.roledesc, t_role_info.roleval FROM t_user_info RIGHT JOIN t_user_role ON t_user_info.userid = t_user_role.userid LEFT JOIN t_role_info ON t_user_role.roleid = t_role_info.roleid WHERE username=#{username}
